entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:28 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
